title: The 2023 Road Season in Numbers: Tadej Pogačar’s Win Ratio, SD Worx Dominance, Fastest Races
content:
Statistics from the 2023 season across the men's and women's peloton, including firsts, fastests, and biggest climbing days of the year.

Read the full article at The 2023 Road Season in Numbers: Tadej Pogačar’s Win Ratio, SD Worx Dominance, Fastest Races on Velo.
